oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drug Disposition and Pharmacokinetic Considerations for Food Safety
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koritz, Gary D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: drug absorption
food-producing animals
food animals
drug residues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper will briefly review drug absorption and disposition in food-producing animals. The application of pharmacokinetics with the objective of avoiding illegal drug residues in food products of animal origin will then be discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Sixth Biennial Symposium; 17-20
